name: Orange Marmalade Chops
instructions: Place a cooling rack on a cookie sheet and turn oven to broil. Place chops on cooling rack and sprinkle both sides liberally with salt and pepper. Broil on both sides until mostly cooked, 4-5 minutes each side. Meanwhile, heat remaining ingredients in small saucepan until hot and liquid. Brush some on chops for last two minutes of cooking, then heat remaining sauce until boiling and serve with chops.
